name: The Temple of Time
description:
You got inside an ancient temple and now you have tha ability of travel in time. If you want to get out of the temple you must solve the puzzles. Be aware of your sorroundings, the environment changes with the time. 

You can rewind the age at any time by pressing K, things will remain in their position at the present time, except if you move them in the past. You can interact with the world pressing J and if something goes wrong just press R to reset the level.

First time joining a game jam, hope you like it! 

Made for the Brackeys Jam 2020.2 in 1 week.
